about.title: About GraceSoft
body: GraceSoft is a Singapore-based software practice founded by Davina Leong, a web developer with experience across modern web systems, AI-related projects, and security-aware application design.
GraceSoft was created with a simple conviction:
about.statement: Software should be built with integrity — and designed to last.
